Class GameView

    • setPlayers

      public void setPlayers​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> players)
      Parameters:
      players - is the list of player's nicknames. set players and init their faithTrack. Then start the game.

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getNickNames()
      Returns:
      the list of player's nicknames. In case it's single player add "LorenzoIlMagnifico" to player' list.
